title: 09/22/2021 - HOUR 1 - Rodgers, Steelers, Simmons, Cowboys
itunes:title: 09/22/2021 - HOUR 1 - Rodgers, Steelers, Simmons, Cowboys
description:
Aaron Rodgers continues to fire back at the media

The Steelers saw the issues with Big Ben for years and ignored them

Ben Simmons doesn't want to be coached hard

Ezekiel Elliott is no longer a star


Guest: Nick Wright
